race.description: The race of the character in the Dungeons & Dragons game

value_dict.dwarf: A race of short and stout folk known for their skill in warfare and ability to withstand physical and magical punishment
value_dict.elf: A race of graceful warriors and wizards, known for their long lives and resistance to sleep magic
value_dict.gnome: A race of small and eccentric individuals, known for their affinity to magic and inventive spirit
value_dict.half.elf: A race of individuals with a mix of human and elven blood, known for their adaptability and versatility
value_dict.half.orc: A race of individuals with a mix of human and orc blood, known for their physical strength and intimidating presence
value_dict.halfling: A race of small, agile individuals, known for their luck and courageous spirit
value_dict.human: The most common race, known for their versatility and ambition
value_dict.tiefling: A race of individuals with demonic ancestry, known for their self-reliance and magical affinity

height.description: The height of the character in inches

weight.description: The weight of the character in pounds

speed.description: The speed of the character in feet per round

strength.description: The strength score of the character, a measure of physical power

dexterity.description: The dexterity score of the character, a measure of agility

constitution.description: The constitution score of the character, a measure of health and stamina

intelligence.description: The intelligence score of the character, a measure of mental acuity

wisdom.description: The wisdom score of the character, a measure of perception and insight

charisma.description: The charisma score of the character, a measure of force of personality

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in fantasy role-playing games.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical and ability features of the character, please predict the race.
prompt.answer_prompt: dragonborn[0], dwarf[1], elf[2], gnome[3], half.elf[4], half.orc[5], halfling[6], human[7], tiefling[8].
